header.note: Google places strick character limits on the various text fields in Google Play. The title is 30 characters, the short description is 80 characters, and the rest of the strings, which all go together in the description, are limited to 4000 characters.

trans-unit.note: This is limited by Google to 30 characters

trans-unit.source: utility for getting information about the APKs that are installed on your device
trans-unit.note: This is limited by Google to 80 characters

trans-unit.source: Checkey is a utility for getting information about the APKs that are installed on your device. Starting with a list of all of the apps that you have installed on your device, it will show you the APK signature with a single touch, and provides links to virustotal.com and androidobservatory.org to easily access the profiles of that APK. It will also let you export the signing certificate and generate ApkSignaturePin pin files for use with the TrustedIntents library.
★ WE SPEAK YOUR LANGUAGE: Checkey is available for friends who speak:
Deutsch, English, español, suomi, 日本語, 한국어, Norsk, Türkçe
trans-unit.note: Do not translate the names of the languages, leave them just like this.

trans-unit.source: Don’t see your language? Join us and help translate the app:
★ ABOUT US: Guardian Project is a group of developers that make secure mobile apps and open-source code for a better tomorrow
★ FREE SOFTWARE: Checkey is free software. You can take a look at our source code, or contribute to help make Checkey even better:

★ MESSAGE US: Are we missing your favorite feature? Found an annoying bug? Please tell us! We’d love to hear from you. Send us an email: support@guardianproject.info or find us in our chat room https://guardianproject.info/contact
